actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: To amend Public Law 87-328, granting the consent of Congress to the Delaware River Basin Compact and making the United States a signatory member thereof.

summary.text: Amends the Delaware River Basin Compact to create a cost-sharing formula for the Francis E. Walter water supply storage project. Provides that one-third of the water supply storage shall be allocable to future demand and not less than two-thirds of such storage portion shall be available for use in the Pennsylvania counties of Luzerne, Lackawanna, Carbon, and Monroe.

titles.title: To amend Public Law 87-328, granting the consent of Congress to the Delaware River Basin Compact and making the United States a signatory member thereof.
